gui.jei.description.rgb_block: It's just a RGB block, nothing special
gui.jei.description.rgb_block_switchable: It's a RGB block, but you can turn it of or on by using redstone
gui.jei.description.rgb_block_redstone: It's a RGB block, but it's emit redstone power
gui.jei.description.rgb_block_slow: It's a RGB block, but slower
gui.jei.description.rgb_block_fast: It's a RGB block, but faster
